Package model

Interface IEditEventOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
EditEventOperations
public interface IEditEventOperations
Defines operations for editing an event in the calendar.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    editEvent(ICalendarModel model, String subject, LocalDateTime from, String property, String newValue, ICalendarService.EditMode mode)
    Edits an event's property.

  • Method Details

    • editEvent

      void editEvent(ICalendarModel model, String subject, LocalDateTime from, String property, String newValue, ICalendarService.EditMode mode) throws Exception
      Edits an event's property.
      Parameters:
      model - the calendar model
      subject - the subject of the event to edit
      from - the original start time
      property - the property to update
      newValue - the new value to set
      mode - the scope of the edit (e.g., SINGLE, FROM, ALL)
      Throws:
      Exception - if editing fails
